name: Common Ground
description: Common Ground is an icebreaker game where the goal is for small groups of people to find things they have in common.
basicRules: Divide the players into small groups of 3-5 people.
The goal for each group is to find a certain number of things that all of them have in common. For example, you could ask them to find 5 things they all have in common.
The things they have in common cannot be obvious things, like 'we are all at this party' or 'we are all human'.
The first group to find the required number of commonalities wins the game.
After the game, you can have each group share some of the interesting things they found they had in common.
tips: Encourage groups to be creative and think outside the box.
Give the groups a time limit to make it more challenging.
This game is a great way to promote teamwork and communication.
